Articles.Content:
I'm trying to complete a contract for moving one of my satellites, but whenever I try to switch over to it, after loading, there are duplicate stock buttons, including some of those only from Making History or EVA even though its unmanned. Then when I switch back to the Space Center, it affects the mod buttons too.

Log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aqj4M0t8GD6c-ZP7lxfPq6PX9HdSEi8S/view?usp=sharing

Okay. now when I right click on a part, the menu only shows "Sample text", and is transparent.

Log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rqR1qzHGV9BvEeEBBbruNrXcOgGpAzlK/view?usp=sharing
Have you got any duplicate squad files at all? Check inside mod folders too; sometimes they include them by mistake.

Here's the transparent right-click menu. The duplicate buttons seem to come from the Mun.

Edited June 3, 2021 by GuessingEveryDay
Mun, not moon.
Hey, was anyone here able to find a fix for this, or at least which mod caused it? I'm having the same problem right now and it's driving me nuts
